column5: two foreigners asked immigration to send them back to their own countries.------The first
column8: who had a lost  passport and was unable to renew a visa after arriving on 02.01-2019 via Poipet.------ Second was PAUL STEVENSON
column9: a 53 year old British male. He entered on 14.09-2019 at Poipet
column10: but has run out of funds to renew his visa.------The couple were referred to the Immigration Department for the investigation and enforcement of the Directorate General of Immigration. ------POST NEWS
